markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lady's Blessing Oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1661)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Travel Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=141) pg. 101</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><row>[Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54)</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Lady's blessing oil is favored by [Pharasmin](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) healers who ease the transitions of life. You can Activate the item as part of the same activity you use to Administer First Aid to stabilize a creature. If you use lady's blessing oil, the DC of the check to Administer First Aid is reduced to the creature's recovery roll DC, rather than 5 + the recovery roll DC. However, if you roll a failure on the check, you get a critical failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Lady's Blessing Oil

text: <title level="1" right="Item 1" pfs="Standard" > Lady's Blessing Oil Source Travel Guide pg. 101 Price 3 gp Usage held in 1 hand Bulk L Activate Administer First Aid --- Lady's blessing oil is favored by Pharasmin healers who ease the transitions of life. You can Activate the item as part of the same activity you use to Administer First Aid to stabilize a creature. If you use lady's blessing oil, the DC of the check to Administer First Aid is reduced to the creature's recovery roll DC, rather than 5 + the recovery roll DC. However, if you roll a failure on the check, you get a critical failure instead.
